description: Description for Oppo F11 (Flourite Purple, 128 GB, 4 GB RAM) Create, capture and discover with the Oppo F11 smartphone. The stylishly sleek phone comes with a 48MP Rear Camera and enables VOOC Flash Charge 3.0 among other things. Stellar looks and powerful features, make this phone desirable to those who are looking to combine utility with aesthetics. The Oppo smartphone also employs the AI Ultra-clear Engine to deliver the perfect Ultra Night Mode. Dual Rear Camera Capture the rarest moments of life with the help of Oppo F11 smartphone that packs in a powerful selfie camera and dual back cameras. The impressive 48MP and 5MP rear camera captures the tiniest details to make it memorable for you. The 5MP supporting camera with depth sensor is the perfect complement to the 48MP and 5MP rear camera, allowing you to bring life to a standstill by adding the required depth to it. The 16MP front camera helps you click artistic selfies so that you have a fond memory of every place your feet wandered upon. Absolute Viewing Pleasure with Waterdrop Display The perfect symmetry of the Waterdrop Screen and the signature Oppo gradient colours come together in this phone to redefine your viewing experience. The Oppo F11 smartphone features a 16.5cm Waterdrop Screen with an impressive screen ratio for the ultimate viewing pleasure. Oppo’s Color Engine further augments the experience with a unique mapping curve to restore brightness and colours to your pictures. Smooth Functionality Engage in the world of technical explorations as the Oppo F11 smartphone keeps you company. Powered by the octa-core MediaTek Helio P70 processor with Android 9 Pie, the smartphone boasts a smooth performance without lagging. The 4GB Ram coupled with the 128GB internal memory further makes it a cakewalk for you by letting you multitask at ease. Talk with your friends, scroll through social media or play games without interruption as the VOOC Flash Charge 3.0 ensures high charging speed in less time. The VOOC 3.0 reaches full charge 20 minutes faster than its previous version. Besides, Oppo F11 is equipped with a 4020mAh battery to keep you powered throughout the day.

description: Description for Nokia 4.2 (Pink, 32 GB, 3 GB RAM) The new smartphone in the block, Nokia 4.2 is crafted for your utmost assistance. Equipped with stellar features, this smartphone users into the digital world with much fanfare. With the promise to let you do more, the Nokia 4.2 will help you stay connected, be entertained and get creative. It comes with instant access to the best of Google Assistant to help you get the best of it. The smartphone also incorporates Google Play Protect and monthly security updates for a seamless experience. Dual Depth Cameras for Innovative Storytelling Make new memories everywhere you go and capture them perfectly with the Nokia 4.2 smartphone that packs in dual depth cameras for creative storytelling. The stunning 13MP main camera captures the sharpest images at myriad angles while the 2MP secondary camera adds depth to your images. The Nokia 4.2 smartphone comes with Google Photos Depth Editor & Color Pop to help you edit images on the go and instantly share them with your friends on social media. The phone also packs in an 8MP front camera with Selfie Notch to give you aesthetic selfies. Captivating Design Crafted with utmost expertise, the slim phone is perfect for those who value style with utility. The 0.84 cm thin phone flaunts a polycarbonate frame with 2.5D glass front and back. The metal internal structure renders the phone durable while the aesthetic finish of the glass body puts it in sync with the latest smartphone trends. Precision Driven Functionality with Google Assistant and Qualcomm Snapdragon Revel in the joys of seamless multitasking with the Nokia 4.2 smartphone that runs on a Qualcomm Snapdragon 439 processor. Known for its high clock speed, the Snapdragon 439 processor does a smooth work of fast operation, even when multiple apps are running at the same time. Operating on Android 9 Pie, the smartphone also boasts a powerful performance without lagging. The smartphone also offers the best of Google Assistant and even incorporates a dedicated Google button. The instant access to your own customised Google Assistant not only eases the task at hand but also makes it better. The Google Assistant gives you faster access to basic information, easy access to Visual Snapshot while also proactively personalising suggestions for enhanced results.

description: Description for LG V40 ThinQ (Platinum, 128 GB, 6 GB RAM) Enjoy a revolution in smartphone photography and so much more with the all new LG V40 ThinQ. This phone comes with an unprecedented five camera setup for absolutely phenomenal photography anywhere and anytime. This smartphone comes with a massive 16.25 cm QHD + OLED display with 3120 x 1440p resolution including the notch with 538 ppi for a vivid and detailed experience. The powerful processor, memory, battery and top notch build along with a crisp design provides much more than just a spectacular camera experience. A Camera Like None Other The all new LG V40 ThinQ brings a never before seen camera experience with its 5 camera build. The rear sports a standard angle 12 MP camera with a Super Wide Angle 16 MP camera and a 12 MP Telephoto zoom lens and with an 8 MP front camera with a 5 MP wide angle lens. Now you can capture moments just the way you want with these standard, telephoto zoom, and super wide-angle cameras. Whether you want to zoom in, get the bigger picture, or take an everyday shot, capture it all in one click. You can capture more of the selfie moment and fuller group shots with the standard and wide-angle front cameras. Add a professional touch to photos by artfully blurring the background or applying studio lighting effects. Choose the areas you want to animate and bring photos to life with a touch of motion. On top of all that the AI Composition automatically edits the position of your subject for an artistic and balanced touch. Features Galore Other than the spectacular cameras the all new LG V40 ThinQ brings so much more to the table. It sports the powerful Qualcomm Snapdragon 845 with 6 GB RAM and 128 GB ROM. This smartphone comes with boombox speakers. Now you can give your audio experience loud, room-filling sound with a boost of bass. Furthermore enjoy the award-winning LG OLED TV technology in the palm of your hand. Weighing just 5.96 ounces, it offers a big-screen experience in a sleek, impressively lightweight design. It also is IP68 Dust and water resistant. It also sports a 3300 mAh Non-Removable battery that provides amazing performance without any hindrance and is perfect for elongated usage. All these features in a sturdy, slick and curious design makes for a perfect smartphone for you.

description: Description for Vivo Y91 (Blue, 32 GB, 2 GB RAM) Witness the beauty and scorching speed of the all new Vivo Y91 with an octa-core processor that runs fast and smoothly with significantly less power and greater storage capacity. Now, you can store a whole lot more while doing a whole lot more. With the dual rear camera, it provides excellent depth of field effects. Now, your photos can tell the full story on all their own. The Y91 has taken dual 13 MP +2 MP back camera for extended depth of field and amazing effects. The result is exquisite, in bright or low light, with images that pop right off the screen. The long-lasting massive 4030 mAh battery gives you a further advantage to experience cool gaming and media function on the go with high visual and sound effect via the speakers or via headphones. The camera quality delivers to you pictures with one click action and perfect for people with intense social media usage and with the 8 MP front camera, it takes care of all your selfie needs as well to the perfection. Its AI algorithm detects your age, gender, skin tone, skin texture, and lighting environment to automatically deliver facial enhancements, without manually adjusting the beauty. Solid Smartphone Experience This smartphone based on Android Oreo 8.1 and running on Funtouch OS 4.5, offers true multitasking. Now you can listen to music with the screen off, identify any object through the lens or handle incoming social media messaging while gaming. The 4030 mAh battery of the Vivo Y91 has been designed for heavy usage and power saving that allows you to have good experience with your smartphone and its features and yet remain steady. This smartphone comes packed with an Octa-core processor along with 2 GB RAM to fulfill all your intense processing needs be it extensive web surfing, consumption of high-end multimedia or quality gaming. This device comes with an internal storage capacity of 32 GB and memory card support of upto 256 GB so that you never run out of space. Futuristic Design The stylish and unique design of the Vivo Y91 makes it unique and one of a kind in the world of smartphones. The all-new 15.75 cm HD+ Halo FullView display stands head and shoulders above conventional notch-displays, featuring a maximized screen-to-body ratio of 88.6%. Furthermore the personal ai assistant Jovi can count your daily steps and calories, tell you the results of your favourite sports teams, update you on the weather, let you know when to pack an umbrella, and advise you to take a rest if you're working late into the night. This revolutionary design packed with a superb processing unit and efficient cameras make this smartphone an absolutely can't miss.

description: Description for Samsung Galaxy A9 (Blue, 128 GB, 8 GB RAM) Ever imagined having four cameras in one single smartphone? Well, that imagination has just become a reality with the all-new Samsung Galaxy A9 Smartphone. Imagination meets reality with such magnificent advancement of technology. The all-new Galaxy A9 features the world’s first quad smartphone camera to capture life the way it was meant to be seen. Its intelligent camera system gives you four times the functionality for whatever the occasion. Take advantage of the hyper-mobile lifestyle with the colorful Galaxy A9. Capture beautiful photos with the world's first quad camera. With a sleek, ergonomic design, your hands stay comfortable as you stay connected. Be a part of what you see as Galaxy A9 features a brilliant 15.95cm FHD+ Super AMOLED Infinity Display that produces sharper contrast and more dynamic color for a much more immersive viewing experience. Get notifications without unlocking your phone as the Always On Display lives up to its name and is always at the ready with notifications, time, date, and even battery level on your screen. Multitasking is made easy as App Pair lets you simultaneously open two apps you often use together while Snap Window pins an important window to the top of the screen, so you can keep track of a streaming video or chat as you work on other things below. Galaxy A9 is also equipped with a 3,800mAh (typical) battery that powers your streaming, chatting, and gaming longer, so you don't have to keep an eye on the nearest cord. The Type-C cable makes it easy to plug in and start charging, while Fast charging capabilities mean you power up in a flash. A Camera Unlike Any Other The all new Samsung Galaxy A9 Smartphone bring a new generation, best in class quad camera setup which accommodates four different cameras for specific purposes. An ultra-wide 8 MP lens for higher angles, a 10 MP telephoto lens for 2x optical zoom buckled with a 24 MP main camera and a 5 MP depth camera for absolutely astonishing clear, bright and vivid images both in daylight and low light situations. You can also effortlessly enhance your photos with intelligent features like Scene Optimizer and Flaw Detection. The 8MP Ultra Wide Camera offers a 120 degrees view that captures almost as much as your eyes can see and when you want to snap even more of the scene, Ultra Wide Camera makes panorama shots easier, too. The 5MP Depth Camera and Main Camera work together to adjust the depth of field, blurring out the background to add a pro-level look to your pictures. You never know when a selfie moment might happen. Be it Day or night, get crisp and clear selfies on Galaxy A9's 24MP front camera, with innovative low light technology that increases brightness while decreasing noise. And Selfie Focus shines a spotlight on you by blurring out the background. Process and Protect You can connect quickly and forget about lagging when it comes to the all-new Samsung Galaxy A9 Smartphone because this beast of a device comes jam-packed with an octa-core processor and 8 GB ram to quench your thirst and need for speed be it in high bandwidth processing, multimedia consumption or high-end gaming. This smartphone comes with 128 GB of internal storage and is expandable up to 512 GB with a micro-SD slot. The Secure Folder gives you a private and fully encrypted space on your phone that only you can access, easily parting out the things you need to keep locked down. And your important files and apps are given an additional layer of protection because they're secured by Samsung Knox and you can access your phone via the ever-reliable face unlock and a lightning fast fingerprint sensor.

description: Description for Vivo V11 (Black, 64 GB, 6 GB RAM) The Vivo V11 will keep you well connected to the world and you will be able to access a large number of apps on it. Stay connected and entertained with this smartphone that is packed with mind blowing features. The 16.28 cm display makes sure you enjoy your favourite movie, music on the go and never worry about the battery running out or the phone having to hang. The powerful Octa Core 2.0 GHz Processor allows you to switch between applications at any instant and increases your productivity levels as well. A great smartphone to have handy during stringent schedules. Thanks to the narrow bezel, even at 16.28 cm, single-handed operation is easy and quite possible. Great Performance It has Android Oreo 8.1 Operating System that keeps it running smoothly. The Vivo V11 has an extraordinary battery power of the 3315 mAh Lithium ion battery that keeps the smart phone running all day without having the user to keep the phone connected to the charger due to low battery charge. This smartphone sports a magnanimous 16 +5 MP dual rear camera along with a massive 25 MP front camera. Both are controlled by our powerful AI algorithm, with the capability to generate artistic bokeh effects with ease. The V11 also allows you to shoot first and focus later, so you can concentrate on capturing life’s wonderful moments while our camera’s AI works its magic. It comes with a colossal 90.4% screen-to-body ratio, delivering an uninterrupted viewing experience on a super-compact body. At the back, V11’s 3D cover features a fresh, unconventional fusion exuding style, quality and class making V11 perfectly designed, both front and back. Multitasking Function You can have a great viewing experience on this smartphone since it has a display resolution of 2280 x 1080 that provide a fantastic experience. The Vivo V11 has been designed to multitask. It is powered by a 6 GB RAM that ensures smooth performance. You can run multiple apps on this phone at the same time. The 2.0 GHz Processor makes the multitasking lag-free. The processor has the capability to perform heavily without heating the phone or causing it to shut down. It has an internal storage of 64 GB.

description: Description for Apple iPhone XR (Black, 128 GB, 3 GB RAM) Enjoy the most premium smartphone ever with this feature-packed Apple iPhone XR and stay up to date with everything around you. The stylish glass design is complemented with an amazing battery for high octane performance so that you can accomplish all your tasks on the palm of your hand. The embedded A12 Bionic chip and Next-generation Neural Engine ensures you can multitask on your phone without any lagging while a solid storage space of 128 GB ensures you never run out of space to store special memories. The 12 MP primary camera allows you to click amazing photos so that you never miss a memory and the 15.49 cm display makes you see every detail to give you an immersive experience. Power Packed Features Keep up with the pace of the fast moving world around you as the amazing battery allows you to fearlessly watch movies, hear songs and do multiple other tasks while on the go. The glass design and wireless charging feature enable you to charge your phone without having to connect it to a power outlet. The 15.49 cm display gives you an amazing display so that you never have to miss out on a detail while the 12 MP camera with true tone technology balances out the light for clear photos. The enhanced audio provides you with entertainment like never before. The 4k video recording option further enhances your shooting experience. High-Performance Processor The Apple iPhone XR grants you an experience like never before. The Apple A12 Bionic Chipset with Next-generation Neural Engine powers extraordinary augmented reality apps and games for an experience like never before. So you can now play games, hear music and chat you’re your best friends all at the same time and keep up with the pace of everything around you. Sleek and Stylish Design Apart from providing you with an amazing performance, the Apple iPhone XR has a very sleek all-glass design which brings out an amazing look and builds an aura around your personality. The display has rounded corners that follow a beautiful curved design and these corners are within a standard rectangle. The water and dust proof design further adds to the phone’s durability and allows you to make a style statement wherever you go.

description: Description for Apple iPhone XR (White, 64 GB, 3 GB RAM) Enjoy the most premium smartphone ever with this feature-packed Apple iPhone XR and stay up to date with everything around you. The stylish glass design is complemented with an amazing battery for high octane performance so that you can accomplish all your tasks on the palm of your hand. The embedded A12 Bionic chip and Next-generation Neural Engine ensures you can multitask on your phone without any lagging while a solid storage space of 64 GB and 3 GB RAM ensures you never run out of space to store special memories. The 12 MP primary camera allows you to click amazing photos so that you never miss a memory and the 15.49 cm Liquid Retina LCD display makes you see every detail to give you an immersive experience. An All New Display An innovative backlight design on the allows the Apple iPhone XR screen to stretch into the corners for you to see true-to-life colour from one beautiful edge to the other. Advanced colour management automatically displays your content in wide colour so everything you look at looks amazing. A six-channel light sensor subtly adjusts the white balance onscreen to match the colour temperature of the light around you. Thus images on the display look as natural as on a printed page and are easier on your eyes. The most durable front glass which is sealed and precision-fitted with the aerospace‑grade aluminium band helps create an enclosure that’s water resistant up to 1 metre for 30 minutes. The iPhone XR even resists spills from coffee, tea, soft drinks and more. High Performance Processor The Apple iPhone XR grants you an experience like never before. The Apple A12 Bionic Chipset with Next-generation Neural Engine powers extraordinary augmented reality apps and games for an experience like never before. So you can now play games, hear music and chat you’re your best friends all at the same time and keep up with the pace of everything around you. Two performance cores tackle heavy computational tasks and four efficiency cores take on everyday tasks. The newest performance controller dynamically divides work across these cores, harnessing all six when a power boost is needed. The glass back enables wireless charging while the battery can be charged at a very high speed achieving 50% charge within 30 minutes. The embedded A12 Bionic chip and Next-generation Neural Engine ensures you can multitask on your phone without any lagging while a solid storage space of 256 GB ensures you never run out of space to store special memories. The 12 MP primary camera allows you to click amazing photos so that you never miss a memory and the 5.8-inch (diagonal) all-screen OLED Multi-Touch display makes you see every detail to give you an immersive experience. Power Packed Features Keep up with the pace of the fast moving world around you as the amazing battery allows you to fearlessly watch movies, hear songs and do multiple other tasks while on the go. The glass design and wireless charging feature enables you to charge your phone without having to connect it to a power outlet. The 5.8-inch (diagonal) all-screen OLED Multi-Touch display gives you an amazing display so that you never have to miss out on a detail while the 12 MP camera with true tone technology balances out the light for clear photos. The enhanced audio provides you with entertainment like never before. The 4k video recording option further enhances your shooting experience. High Performance Processor Running on iOS 12 operating system, this Apple iPhone XS grants you an experience like never before. The Apple A12 Bionic Chipset with Next-generation Neural Engine powers extraordinary augmented reality apps and games for an experience like never before. So you can now play games, hear music and chat you’re your best friends all at the same time and keep up with the pace of everything around you. Sleek and Stylish Design Apart from providing you with an amazing performance, the Apple iPhone XS has a very sleek all glass design which brings out an amazing look and builds an aura around your personality. The display has rounded corners that follow a beautiful curved design and these corners are within a standard rectangle. The engineered IP68 water and dust proof design further adds to the phone’s durability and allows you to make a style statement wherever you go.

description: Description for Xiaomi Redmi 6 Pro (Gold, 64 GB, 4 GB RAM) The Xiaomi Redmi 6 Pro provides you with hassle-free functionality since it has a processor which delivers faster performance with the all-new 14nm technology and will help you through your schedule. It has 12 MP and 5 MP rear cameras which deliver to you pictures with one click action and are perfect for people with intense social media usage. Through face sensing and bio-sensing technology, the AI face unlocks algorithm is able to distinguish faces with high accuracy and speed. The cameras have AI Portrait Mode which provides professional background blurring for stunning pictures. Expandable Storage The long-lasting 4000 mAh battery lets you use the smartphone for a long time, making it really convenient for you. It is really efficient and it allows you to stay connected with your friends and family at all times. The 2 + 1 SIM card slots allow for dual SIM cards and microSD storage expansion up to 256GB. You do not have to worry about running out of storage any longer. The slim design of the efficient Xiaomi Redmi 6 Pro makes it easy to hold and carry. The thin bezel and the large screen give it the uniqueness and let you enjoy high definition videos and image quality at the palm of your hand. AI Security Systems The smartphone provides you with AI Face and Fingerprint Unlock systems which provide a great layer of security to your smartphone. It protects your privacy by securing your phone. The Xiaomi Redmi 6 Pro is powered by the Snapdragon 625 octa-core processor that keeps it running smoothly and provides lag-free usage. You do not have the worry about having drained out battery during the day since one full charge will easily last you two days with continuous gaming, internet surfing, clicking pictures in high quality or hearing your favorite music.

description: Description for LG K9 Candy (Black, 16 GB, 2 GB RAM) OverviewThe LG Candy K9 is a smartphone that comes loaded with features. This smartphone is ideal for making calls and receiving it, checking and sending out emails, being connected to social media apps such as Facebook, YouTube, Twitter, and WhatsApp. This LG smartphone is light in weight and easy to carry, so you can multitask with speed. It runs on an Android operating system that allows you to download thousands of apps and stream videos and music or access the internet and access great photos. Another great feature of this smartphone is that it supports Dual SIM that allows you to choose any GSM carrier for calling. It also features display technology that allows you to open apps and chose your favorite settings with a touch.Impressive FeaturesThe LG Candy K9 is compact yet powerful. It has a comfortable grip with soft round edges and non-slip rear cover improve one-hand usability and deliver a more comfortable, tactile experience. It has an immersive 12.7 cm HD display that provides realistic colours and produce crisp pictures thereby giving you a theatre like feel. The smartphone also has an 8MP rear camera which lets you take perfect shots and never compromises on any frame. Indulge in a photo shoot with your kids or family members or take mind-blowing pictures of sunsets and nature with the 8MP rear camera. Additionally, one can also take advantage of the front camera and make video/skype calls with your friends and family members. The smartphone has noise-reduction in low-light feature that reduces noise in low-light, means no matter the time or place, the picture you take is the picture you get that is clear, crisp, and captivating. The flash jump cut is another extraordinary feature that allows you to make your favourite GIF. Simply, using the flash as your aide, take a sequence of fun jump cuts that can be automatically spliced into a GIF. The smartphone has a powerful quad-core processor that allows you to multitask without any lag. Use the WiFi feature to connect to the internet and browse thousands of pages you like or steam a movie on Netflix or Hulu to get entertained. The The LG Candy K9 also comes equipped with GPS that allows you to navigate your car to office or go to your favourite restaurant. The smartphone has built-in Bluetooth technology that allows you to transfer files such as music, documents and images. If you want to enjoy listening to your favourite music then the phone has a 3.5 mm jack that can be connected to a headphone to stream your favourite songs. Overall, the LG Candy K9 is great smartphone with lots of features and quite inexpensive.

description: Description for LG Q Stylus+ (Black, 64 GB, 4 GB RAM) Overview The LG Q Stylus Plus, released in June 2018, is the latest phone from LG to feature a stylus. The device comes with great specifications and a waterproof body. The stylus can be used to take notes with the display off, to edit captured images and videos, and to create GIFs. Featuring LG’s “palm rejection” system that can tell the difference between an intentional touch with a stylus and an accidental touch with your palm, the LG Q Stylus Plus is a smartphone with QLens technology, 4GB of RAM and 64GB storage. It also features a tall screen, the DTS:X 3D surround sound with IP68 certifications as well.   Premium Design The LG Q Stylus Plus sports an aluminium alloy overall unibody. This is military grade MIL-STD-810G compliant, and can survive falls and pressure. With its IP68 certifications, it can even be taken to the pool. It’s also scratch resistant, waterproof and dust-proof. Furthermore, the fingerprint scanner offers a biometric access to the device. Featuring a real metal frame and 2.5D Arc Glass, the phone has a premium look. Not only in looks but the holding comfort of this phone is also superlative. The stylus can be used to write on the screen without turning on the display. The GIF Capture feature lets you take fun snippets of video, edit them with your stylus, and share them with friends. The Smart Rear Key allows you to use your fingerprint to open quick shutter, quick screenshot, and even control notifications. Stunning Display The LG Q Stylus Plus has 18:9 aspect ratio screen, for the normal full-view experience. The narrow bezels are super tiny. The 6.2-inch FHD+ IPS LCD capacitive touchscreen brings out stunning colours. It has a resolution of 1080 x 2160 pixels and 389 pixel per inch density, offering clear visuals. Impressively, the screen stretches up to 80% screen-to-body ratio. Optimal Configuration Under the hood, the LG Q Stylus Plus adopts Snapdragon 450 chip from Qualcomm. The chipset is built on a power efficient 14nm process technology. It has 8-Cores of processor which clocks at a smooth speed of 1.8GHz for improved performance. The Adreno 506 graphics processor controls graphics and clocks at 600MHz. With 4GB RAM space available, you can easily multitask through more heavy apps. This smartphone has a memory speed of 933MHz. The 64 GB storage is quite enough for normal usage but you can further increase this up to 2TB using a memory card. The LG Q Stylus Plus runs smoothly on Android 8.1 Oreo with modified user interface. Competent Camera The LG Q Stylus Plus is equipped with a 16MP rear camera having f/2.0 aperture with other features like phase detection autofocus, LED flash, Geo-tagging, touch focus, face detection, panorama, HDR. Videos of 1080p can be recorded at @30fps. While the 8MP selfie camera takes beautiful portraits. Flawless Sound The LG Q Stylus Plus features DTS: X which is a mobile-optimized technology that delivers louder, richer audio for movies, music and games. Quick Charging Battery Powering the LG Q Stylus Plus is a 3300mAh non-removable Li-Ion battery with fast charging technology. With the fast charging feature, charging the battery from 0% to 100% shouldn’t take up more than 2 hours. Fast Charging can be done with a USB Type-C. You can charge your device much faster than conventional chargers with the easy-to-connect, reversible Type-C connector.

description: Description for Nokia 5.1 (Black, 32 GB, 3 GB RAM) The ever so reliable Nokia is back with a bang with the all-new Nokia 5.1  which provides you with one of the best smartphone experiences so that you never have to look elsewhere. Designed with an eye for detail, the new Nokia 5 defines premium craftsmanship. It delivers a sharper and bigger viewing experience, thanks to the Full HD+13.97 cm IPS display with an 18:9 ratio. The 16 MP phase detection auto-focus rear camera takes detailed photos, while the 8 MP front camera with an 84.6-degree field of view is perfect for group selfies. The phone takes your camera experience to subliminal levels so that you never have to miss out on any special moments. The 13.97 cm IPS display gives you a breath-taking visual experience, while the 2970 mAh battery with super power saver mode can run for a really long duration so that you never have to face difficulties in an emergency situation. The MT6755S Octa-Core 2.0 GHz processor helps you get a better performance so that you do not have to get stuck while multitasking. The durable aluminium unibody adds to your style statement where ever you go. Efficient Functionality Experience a smooth performance with a 2.0 GHz octa-core processor. It improves the experience of using your phone and does not let your phone hang while multi-tasking. The 3 GB RAM makes your smartphone a very viable option for you so that you can multitask without fear of losing out on any data and time. So you can now play games, hear music and chat you’re your best friends all at the same time and keep up with the pace of everything around you. The 2970 mAh battery lasts you a long while giving you up to 19 hours of maximum talk time and maximum standby of a whopping 24.5 days to ensure you do not spend a lot of time away from your phone. A Complete Camera Experience The new Nokia 5.1 features a 16 MP main camera with phase detection auto-focus, a faster and more reliable auto-focus system that lets you capture every detail. And the 8 MP front camera is equipped with an 84.6° field of view that fits the whole party in the same frame and a potential game-changer for selfie lovers. Design And Storage Apart from being a smartphone with amazing performance, the phone has a very neat finish which adds to your style statement wherever you go being sculpted from a single block of aluminium, the new Nokia 5 goes through a precise machining process to achieve its refined look. From the beautifully rounded corners to the perfect way it fits in your hand, every detail shows a dedication to high-quality craftsmanship.The Android One Experience Android One brings a Google-designed software experience to the new Nokia 5.1. Get everything you want and nothing you don’t with a streamlined, easy to use interface and a curated set of pre-installed apps, and free, unlimited high quality photos storage2 with Google Photos. Regular security updates and two years of OS upgrades means the new Nokia 5 with Android One stays secure and features the latest Google innovations like being optimized for the Google Assistant.

description: Description for Vivo Z10 (Black, 32 GB, 4 GB RAM) Overview The Vivo Z10 smartphone was launched in July 2018 by Vivo India. The phone comes with a 6” touchscreen display with a resolution of 720x1440 pixels. Having an all-metal unibody premium design, the Vivo Z10 flaunts a rear-mounted fingerprint sensor and face-unlock capabilities.    Smart Design & Immersive Display  The Vivo Z10 has a plastic body and a capacitive touchscreen. The screen is protected by durable scratch resistant corning gorilla glass. It has a single rear camera at the top left corner with the LED flash beside it. There’s a rear fingerprint scanner as well which grants biometric access to the device. It measures just 7.7 mm in thickness when you turn over to the sides and weighs 160g overall. Colours available are Blue, Black and Gold. This phone features a 6-inch HD+ (720x1440 pixels) Full View Display panel that has an 18:9 aspect ratio and a screen-to-body ratio of 84.4%. The Vivo Z10 features 2.15mm narrow bezel and a HD+ Display. The side bezels are almost non-existent while the top and bottom bezels are super minimal. The tall 5.99-inch HD+ IPS LCD capacitive touchscreen displays the standard visuals. It boasts of 720 x 1440 pixels in resolution and 269 pixel per inch density, for clear display. It stretches up to 78.4% screen-to-body ratio with the Corning Gorilla Glass 4 on top.  Hardware and Software  Under the hood, the Vivo Z10 adopts Snapdragon 450 chip from Qualcomm. The chip was built on a 14nm technology, so power efficiency is great. It has 8-cores of processor which clocks at 1.8GHz. While the Adreno 506 graphics card handles graphics. The Vivo Z10 comes with 4GB of RAM space for heavy multitasking of all your apps and storage space of 32GB, which can be extended up to 256GB using a memory card. It runs on Android 7.1.2 Nougat with Funtouch OS 3.2..There are several built in Applications including WhatsApp, Facebook, Google Play Store, Google, Chrome, Gmail, Maps, YouTube, Drive, Play Music, Play Movies & TV, Photos, Play Games, News & Weather, Voice Search, Google S, WPS Office, UC Browser, amazon, and Saavn. The phone sensors include all the usual sensors like proximity sensor, accelerometer, fingerprint sensor and ambient light sensor.    Camera and Video   The Vivo Z10 is equipped with a powerful 24MP Front camera with Moonlight glow which creates the lighting effects of a professional photography studio, giving you soft radiant complexion along with Vivo’s exclusive Face Beauty algorithm ensuring natural facial enhancement even in low light. With Portrait Mode, you really stand out in your photos. Background blurring sharpens contrast, transforming even busy environments into the perfect backdrop. The 24MP camera has f/2.0 aperture, LED flash and supports Face ID. Its fingerprint sensor also allows you to capture selfies by simply placing your finger on the sensor. The rear camera is a 16MP shooter and boasts of f/2.0 aperture, 1/3″ sensor size, 1.0µm pixel size and PDAF. The rear camera is designed with Ultra HD mode that makes 64 MP photos through image stacking. It also comes with a LED flash and has other features like geo-tagging, touch focus, face detection, HDR (High Dynamic Range). It shoots 1080p videos@30fps and supports Slow Motion mode and 64MP Ultra HD image upscaling functionality. Furthermore, it includes other features such as Smart Split 3.0 and Live Photo. All of life’s defining moments look their best with the Vivo Z10! Additionally, Vivo's new a face-detection unlocking feature called Face Access scans multiple areas of the face and unlocks after identifying the biological facial features. This face biometric system greatly improves your security measures. Battery Powering the Vivo Z10 is a 3225mAh non-removable Li-Ion battery with fast charging technology. With the fast charging feature, charging the battery from 0% to 100% shouldn’t take up to 2 hours.   Network and Connectivity   This phone offers two slots for sim cards and one SD Card Slot. You can use two sim cards simultaneously in one phone. The Vivo Z10 offers 4G/LTE, 2G, 3G, GSM, Wi-Fi Capability and Wi-Fi Hotspot, Bluetooth, GPS/ A-GPS, Micro-USB, FM and a 3.5mm headphone jack as the part of connectivity options.

description: Description for Samsung Galaxy J8 (Gold, 64 GB, 4 GB RAM) OverviewThe South Korean manufacturer, Samsung offers a wide range of quality smartphones. One of its best mid-range devices is Galaxy J8 which was launched in India in May 2018 for the first time.    The Samsung Galaxy J8 comes with loaded spec-sheet. The smartphone delivers a great performance while handling multitasking and running heavy games. The cameras can capture quality images as well as record high definition videos. You can save ample songs, videos, files, documents, etc. in this device as it houses a great storage.    Great performer The Samsung Galaxy J8 comes equipped with an Android V8.0 Oreo operating system with 1.8 GHz Qualcomm Snapdragon SDM450 octa-core processor. This is further assisted by a 4GB RAM. Due to its powerful features, this device can run multiple applications at a single time. The Galaxy J8 software also supports Dual-SIM (LTE+LTE), Micro SIM with 4GLTE, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, GPS.    Excellent cameras  In terms of photography and videography, the dual rear cameras come with 16MP (F1.7) + 5MP(F1.9) lenses. The lenses provide crisp and clear photos and can record good quality videos. Moreover, a 16MP (F1.9) front camera placed just above the display takes care of the selfie needs of the system. It also helps to facilitate high-resolution video calls.   The Samsung Galaxy J8 has features such as geo-tagging, touch focus, face detection, panorama and HDR which enhance the picture quality of this phone. For top-notch photographs, the primary camera of this phone has autofocus and a front LED flash.    The advanced front camera of the Samsung Galaxy J8 uses your face, as a password, to unlock the phone to ensure that the contents of your phone are only for your eyes.   Stunning Design and Display  Live bezel-free. The fluid body is wrapped with smooth curves for a virtually continuous screen. The ergonomic placement of the fingerprint sensor at the back gives you a seamless unlocking experience.   The screen size of Samsung Galaxy J8 is 15.36cm (6") HD+ and has a resolution of 1480 x 720 pixels. This phone features a capacitive touchscreen and IPS LCD display technology.    The Super AMOLED Infinity display of the Samsung Galaxy J8 delivers stunning color reproduction and deep contrasts. It has an 18:5:9 display ratio which gives you a massive viewing area. Sensors such as light sensor, proximity sensor, and accelerometer are inbuilt into the Samsung Galaxy J8 for superior performance.   It comes in different color options- blue, black and gold. The dimensions of this phone are 159.2 x 75.7 x 8.2 mm making it easy to fit into any pocket.   Multimedia Feature   The Samsung Galaxy J8 has an Audio Player of MP3, AAC, AAC+, eAAC+, WMA, AMR-NB/WB and a Video Player of H.264, MPEG-4, H.263, VC-1, WMV7, WMV8. The features such as gaming, FM radio and also speakers are provided. It is also equipped with a 3.5mm Audio Jack.    Storage   The Samsung Galaxy J8 houses a 64GB inbuilt storage, which is enough to fulfill your demands. You can store ample amount of songs, images, videos etc. Moreover, the storage can be increased up to 256GB by using a memory card. With Samsung Galaxy J8, you can use various chatting and social media apps without pausing your videos, you can talk to your loved ones on video calls without any interruption and multitask with unmatched speed. This phone gives you an unlimited phone book and features messaging including all SMS, MMS, Email, Push Mail and also IM. It can store unlimited call records for future references.   Battery and Network Support   Many of us play games, check out Facebook or news apps, navigate using Google Maps, download, read and reply to emails and all manner of other things in addition to making cellular calls and sending text messages on the go. The Li-Ion 3500 mAh battery provides longevity and ensures that you can go longer without recharging to get the maximum out of your phone.   This phone supports GSM/ HSPA/ LTE technology - 3G HSDPA 850 / 900 / 1900 / 2100 MHz, 2G – GSM 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900 MHz network (Sim 1 and Sim 2) and also has a 4GVoLTE network support. It supports GPRS and EDGE.

description: Description for Samsung Galaxy J8 (Blue, 64 GB, 4 GB RAM) OverviewThe South Korean manufacturer, Samsung offers a wide range of quality smartphones. One of its best mid-range devices is Galaxy J8 which was launched in India in May 2018 for the first time. The SAMSUNG Galaxy J8 comes with loaded specifications. The smartphone delivers a great performance while handling multitasking and running heavy games. The cameras can capture quality images as well as record high definition videos. You can save ample songs, videos, files, documents, etc. in this device as it houses great storage.Great PerformanceThe Samsung Galaxy J8 comes equipped with an Android V8.0 Oreo operating system with 1.8 GHz Qualcomm Snapdragon SDM450 octa core processor. This is further assisted by a 4GB RAM. Due to its powerful features, this device can run multiple applications at a single time. The Galaxy J8 software also supports Dual-SIM (LTE+LTE), Micro SIM with 4GLTE, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, GPS.Excellent CameraIn terms of photography and videography, the dual rear cameras come with 16MP (F1.7) + 5MP (F1.9) lenses. The lenses provide crisp and clear photos and can record good quality videos. Moreover, a 16MP (F1.9) front camera placed just above the display takes care of the selfie needs of the system. It also helps to facilitate high-resolution video calls. The Samsung Galaxy J8 has features such as geo-tagging, touch focus, face detection, panorama and HDR which enhance the picture quality of this phone. For top-notch photographs, the primary camera of this phone has autofocus and a front LED flash. The advanced front camera of the Samsung Galaxy J8 uses your face, as a password, to unlock the phone to ensure that the contents of your phone are only for your eyes.Stunning Design and DisplayLive bezel-free. The fluid body is wrapped with smooth curves for a virtually continuous screen. The ergonomic placement of the fingerprint sensor at the back gives you a seamless unlocking experience. The screen size of Samsung Galaxy J8 is 15.36cm (6") HD+ and has a resolution of 1480 x 720 pixels. This phone features a capacitive touchscreen and IPS LCD display technology. The Super AMOLED Infinity display of this device delivers stunning colour reproduction and deep contrasts. It has an 18.5:9 display ratio which gives you a massive viewing area. Sensors such as light sensor, proximity sensor, and accelerometer are inbuilt into the Samsung Galaxy J8 for superior performance. It comes with different colour options- blue, black and gold. The dimensions of this phone are 159.2 x 75.7 x 8.2 mm making it easy to fit into any pocket.Multimedia FeatureThe Samsung Galaxy J8 has an Audio Player which supports MP3, AAC, AAC+, eAAC+, WMA, AMR-NB/WB and a Video Player of H.264, MPEG-4, H.263, VC-1, WMV7, WMV8. The features such as gaming, FM radio and powerful speakers are provided. It is also equipped with a 3.5mm Audio Jack.Sufficient StorageThe  Samsung Galaxy J8 houses a 64GB inbuilt storage, which is enough to fulfil your demands. You can store ample amount of songs, images, videos etc. Moreover, the storage can be increased up to 256GB by using a memory card. With Samsung Galaxy J8, you can use various chatting and social media apps without pausing your videos; you can talk to your loved ones on video calls without any interruption and multitask with unmatched speed. This phone gives you an unlimited phone book and features messaging including all SMS, MMS, Email, Push Mail and also IM. It can store unlimited call records for future references.Battery and network supportMany of us play games, check out Facebook or news apps, and navigate using Google Maps, download, read and reply to emails and all manner of other things in addition to making cellular calls and sending text messages on the go. The Li-Ion 3500 mAh battery provides longevity and ensures that you can last during the day. This phone supports GSM/ HSPA/ LTE technology - 3G HSDPA 850 / 900 / 1900 / 2100 MHz, 2G – GSM 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900 MHz network (Sim 1 and Sim 2) and also has a 4GVoLTE network support. It supports GPRS and EDGE.

description: Description for Samsung Galaxy S9+ (Sunrise Gold, 128 GB, 6 GB RAM) OverviewThe South Korean manufacturer, Samsung offers a wide range of quality smartphones. The Galaxy S9 Plus is one of the best big-screen phones around in terms of what you get for the money. The smartphone comes with a 10nm, 64bit, octa-core Exynos 9810 (4x 2.9GHz + 4x 1.9GHz) with 6GB of RAM and supports for up to 400GB microSD card. As it features the latest Exynos 9810 Octa Chipset and Mali-G72 MP18 GPU, it delivers a great performance. It has small convenient features like water resistance and wireless charging which make a big difference in your daily life. This phone features a dual sim option so that you can use two numbers simultaneously in one phone. Accelerometer, Barometer, Gyro Sensor, Compass, Hall Sensor, HR Sensor, Proximity Sensor, RGB Light Sensor, Pressure sensor are the different sensors that make your phone so exclusive. Stunning Design and Display The Galaxy S9 Plus is designed beautifully to fit comfortably in your hand and to give you ease of use. The camera sits flush with the back for a smooth surface. The fingerprint sensor is designed ergonomically so that you can unlock the phone with one easy move. The phone is designed with a 6.2-inch Quad HD+ curved display which has an aspect ratio of 18:5:9 (Infinity Display). The default resolution is Full HD+ but you can easily change it to Quad HD+ via settings. With its stunning edge-to-edge Infinity Display, the Samsung Galaxy S9 Plus showcases your photos and videos on a beautiful edge-to-edge screen. Excellent Camera Dual Aperture camera that adapts like your eye! The Galaxy S9 Plus captures stunning pictures in bright daylight and super low light and is able to automatically switch between various lighting conditions with ease—making your photos look great whether it's bright or dark, day or night. In addition, the camera works brilliantly in the dark as the F1.5 aperture mode finds light even in darkness. So the low light camera keeps delivering vibrant photos late into the night. The Super Slow-mo feature slows down time, making everyday moments epic! Super Slow-mo lets you see the things you could have missed while blinking your eyes. You can add your favourite music to the video or turn the video into a looping GIF, and share it with a tap. The rear dual-camera setup in the Galaxy S9 Plus has a 12MP telephoto and 12MP wide-angle lenses with an aperture of f/2.4 and f/1.5 respectively. You can easily capture your night-time adventures with stunning clarity as it has the F1.5 aperture mode and multi-frame noise reduction that ensures the photos you take in the dark come out clear and bright.  The Galaxy S9 Plus can also shoot 960fps slow-motion video for those special moments. The front camera has an 8MP f/1.7 A/F lens for selfies. The Autofocus feature and Optical Image Stabilisation (OIS) on both the lenses make taking photos so convenient. The Live Translation feature of the Galaxy S9 Plus uses the camera to instantly read what your eyes can't. Get real-time translation when you need it and see the world in a new way! The Intelligent Scan feature of the Galaxy S9 Plus makes the phone camera recognize you instantly. Intelligent Scan is a new technology that combines face recognition and iris scan to make unlocking simple even in low light and upgrades the security of your phone to a new level. AR Emojis With this AR Emoji feature, you can turn your selfie into an emoji and watch your messaging come alive. You can create an augmented reality version of yourself that represents your inner self and then send your message across with the emoji that follows your movements and expressions. You can also personalize your emojis to show off your own style by changing your hair or your clothes. You can even record videos with your emoji talking, singing, or any other action and share it with your friends. Seems like fun!MultimediaThe Galaxy S9 Plus has to surround sound speakers. The stereo speakers tuned by AKG offers pure Dolby Atmos three-dimensional sound giving you a vibrant, theatre-like audio experience. The Galaxy S9 Plus is provided with MP3 player, MMS and comes with a 3.5mm Audio Jack. Security The Galaxy S9 Plus comes with the security of Samsung Knox that is built into the phone from the chip up. Protecting your sensitive data from prying eyes is very easy now. Other features like Iris scanner, Fingerprint Scanner, Face Detection add layer upon layer to the security of your phone. The Galaxy S9 Plus is designed with a technology that combines face recognition and iris scan. When face recognition needs help, iris scan kicks in to verify you—and vice versa. This enables your phone to recognize you even in low light and you can instantly unlock when and where you need to. Water and dust resistance Don't be afraid to go out and get wet. The Galaxy S9 Plus has an IP68 rating which means you don't need to stop texting or taking photos even during the rain. This phone is water and dust resistant.  Wireless charging The Galaxy S9 Plus has a wireless charging feature. All you need to do is to place your phone on the wireless charger to power up with ease. It also props up your phone at a comfortable angle so that you can continue streaming and texting while charging. Memory and Storage  The Galaxy S9 Plus has a RAM Size of 6 GB, while the internal Memory has two options of 64 GB/256 GB. External Memory can be added using a MicroSD card to increase the memory up to 400 GB when you need more storage for all your photos and files. Network and Connectivity The Galaxy S9 Plus allows Wi-Fi connectivity and hotspot as well as Bluetooth, Volte, NFC and USB (Type C) options. It supports 2G/ 3G/ 4G network and GPS/ A-GPS. By connecting your Galaxy S9 Plus to DeX Pad and a monitor its easy to turn your phone into a touchpad for a desktop-like experience. This way it is easy to access photos and files on your phone, check emails, surf the internet and more on a full-size scree n. Battery Many of us play games, check out Facebook or news apps, navigate using Google Maps, download, read and reply to emails and all manner of other things in addition to making cellular calls and sending text messages on the go. The Li-Ion 3500 mAh battery provides longevity and ensures that you can go longer without recharging to get the maximum out of your phone.

description: Description for Apple iPhone 6s (Gold, 32GB, 2 GB RAM) Vivid Display The Apple iPhone 6s comes with a 4.7 inch Retina HD display with built-in 3D touch. An embedded M9 motion co-processor is a part of this chip, which is responsible for measuring all your fitness related aspects, the best part is that it is designed to consume minimal power and extend battery life. This phone offers standby time up to 10 days on a single charge. Innovative Camera The iPhone 6s from Apple features a rear facing 12 MP camera sensor with support for Live Photos and Focus Pixels for better Autofocus. It has a large f/2.2 aperture for better indoor and low light photos. It also features a true tone flash to provide flash photography with accurate colors and skin tones. This camera can record up to 4k video at 30 fps and 720p slow motion video at 240 fps. This iPhone also features a 5 MP HD Facetime camera that is perfect for video calls and snapping selfies. It can record 720p HD videos. Siri Support With Siri, you can send messages, set alarms etc with you voice by just commanding Siri. This features allows your phone to be handsfree and she also identifies songs for you. Siri also gives proactive suggestions when you are in a fix. Sufficient Storage Capacity This phone provides you with a huge 32 GB storage to safe-keep every little information you feel is important. This iPhone has been designed keeping in mind our insatiable need to keep every memory alive. Now never worry about losing your important documents and files. Dependable Privacy and Security iOS offers the most advanced security of any mobile operating system. The Touch ID prevents unauthorised access to your device by letting you use your fingerprint as an easy alternative to entering your passcode each time.
